references.paper_title: The UEA multivariate time series classification archive, 2018
references.reason: This paper provides a benchmark dataset crucial for evaluating the performance of multivariate time series classification models, which is essential to the research presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: TimesNet: Leveraging fast Fourier transform and parameter-efficient inception block for time series modeling
references.reason: This work introduces TimesNet, a foundational model for general time series analysis, which the current research builds upon and extends to include mixed time series.

references.paper_title: LightTS: Lightweight time series classification with adaptive ensemble distillation
references.reason: This paper proposes LightTS, another significant model for time series classification that serves as a strong baseline against which the current research's proposed MiTSformer model is compared.

references.paper_title: Multi-scale self-supervised representation learning with temporal alignment for multi-rate time series modeling
references.reason: This work, also by the current authors, develops crucial techniques for handling multi-rate time series, which are integrated into the MiTSformer model.

references.paper_title: ModernTCN: A modern pure convolution structure for general time series analysis
references.reason: This paper introduces ModernTCN, a strong baseline model for general time series analysis, providing a comparison point for the performance of MiTSformer.
